column5: hey everyone...im trying to attach a pic but its faiing and saying the picture size is too big...is there any way to make it smaller so i can up load it?  thanks
Upload your images to photobucket ... after you've loaded them there click on the IMG code ... copy and paste it here.   RFS

Not sure what operating system you are running but you can download a "picture resizer" program for most.(search google type in "picture resizer" ) Once downloaded right click on said picture and an option for resizing should be there.
